org.fujion.gmaps

Class MapOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.gmaps.MapOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter, IClientTransform

    public class MapOptions
extends Options
    Options for a Google Map.

    • Field Detail

      • backgroundColor

        @Option
public String backgroundColor
        Color used for the background of the Map div. This color will be visible when tiles have not yet loaded as the user pans. This option can only be set when the map is initialized.

      • center

        @Option
public LatLng center
        The initial Map center. Required.

      • clickableIcons

        @Option
public Boolean clickableIcons
        When false, map icons are not clickable. A map icon represents a point of interest, also known as a POI.

        Default: true

      • disableDefaultUI

        @Option
public Boolean disableDefaultUI
        Enables/disables all default UI. May be overridden individually.

      • disableDoubleClickZoom

        @Option
public Boolean disableDoubleClickZoom
        Enables/disables zoom and center on double click. Note: This property is not recommended. To disable zooming on double click, you can use the gestureHandling property, and set it to "none".

        Default: false

      • draggableCursor

        @Option
public String draggableCursor
        The name or url of the cursor to display when mousing over a draggable map. This property uses the css cursor attribute to change the icon. As with the css property, you must specify at least one fallback cursor that is not a URL. For example: draggableCursor: 'url(http://www.example.com/icon.png), auto;'.

      • draggingCursor

        @Option
public String draggingCursor
        The name or url of the cursor to display when the map is being dragged. This property uses the css cursor attribute to change the icon. As with the css property, you must specify at least one fallback cursor that is not a URL. For example: draggingCursor: 'url(http://www.example.com/icon.png), auto;'.

      • fullscreenControl

        @Option
public Boolean fullscreenControl
        The enabled/disabled state of the Fullscreen control.

      • fullscreenControlOptions

        @Option
public FullscreenControlOptions fullscreenControlOptions
        Options for Fullscreen control.

      • gestureHandling

        @Option
public GestureHandlingType gestureHandling
        Controls how the API handles gestures on the map.

        Default: AUTO

      • heading

        @Option
public Double heading
        The heading for aerial imagery in degrees measured clockwise from cardinal direction North. Headings are snapped to the nearest available angle for which imagery is available.

      • keyboardShortcuts

        @Option
public Boolean keyboardShortcuts
        If false, prevents the map from being controlled by the keyboard.

        Default: true

      • mapTypeControl

        @Option
public Boolean mapTypeControl
        The initial enabled/disabled state of the Map type control.

      • mapTypeControlOptions

        @Option
public final MapTypeControlOptions mapTypeControlOptions
        Map type control options.

      • mapTypeId$enum

        @Option(value="mapTypeId")
public MapTypeId mapTypeId$enum
        The initial Map mapTypeId as an enum.

        Default: ROADMAP

      • mapTypeId$string

        @Option(value="mapTypeId")
public String mapTypeId$string
        The initial Map mapTypeId as a string.

      • maxZoom

        @Option
public Integer maxZoom
        The maximum zoom level which will be displayed on the map. If omitted, or set to null, the maximum zoom from the current map type is used instead. Valid values: Integers between zero, and up to the supported maximum zoom level.

      • minZoom

        @Option
public Integer minZoom
        The minimum zoom level which will be displayed on the map. If omitted, or set to null, the minimum zoom from the current map type is used instead. Valid values: Integers between zero, and up to the supported maximum zoom level.

      • noClear

        @Option
public Boolean noClear
        If true, do not clear the contents of the Map div.

      • rotateControl

        @Option
public Boolean rotateControl
        The enabled/disabled state of the Rotate control.

      • rotateControlOptions

        @Option
public final RotateControlOptions rotateControlOptions
        The display options for the Rotate control.

      • scaleControl

        @Option
public Boolean scaleControl
        The initial enabled/disabled state of the Scale control.

      • scaleControlOptions

        @Option
public final ScaleControlOptions scaleControlOptions
        The initial display options for the Scale control.

      • scrollWheel

        @Option
public Boolean scrollWheel
        If false, disables zooming on the map using a mouse scroll wheel. Note: This property is not recommended. To disable zooming using scrollwheel, you can use the gestureHandling property, and set it to either "cooperative" or "none".

        Default: true

      • streetViewOptions

        @Option
public final StreetViewPanoramaOptions streetViewOptions
        Options to create a StreetViewPanorama to display when the Street View pegman is dropped on the map. If no panorama is specified, a default StreetViewPanorama will be displayed in the map's div when the pegman is dropped.

      • streetViewControl

        @Option
public Boolean streetViewControl
        The initial enabled/disabled state of the Street View Pegman control. This control is part of the default UI, and should be set to false when displaying a map type on which the Street View road overlay should not appear (e.g. a non-Earth map type).

      • streetViewControlOptions

        @Option
public final StreetViewControlOptions streetViewControlOptions
        The initial display options for the Street View Pegman control.

      • styles

        @Option
public final MapTypeStyleOptions styles
        Styles to apply to each of the default map types. Note that for satellite/hybrid and terrain modes, these styles will only apply to labels and geometry.

      • tilt

        @Option
public TiltAngle tilt
        Controls the automatic switching behavior for the angle of incidence of the map. The only allowed values are 0 and 45. The value 0 causes the map to always use a 0° overhead view regardless of the zoom level and viewport. The value 45 causes the tilt angle to automatically switch to 45 whenever 45° imagery is available for the current zoom level and viewport, and switch back to 0 whenever 45° imagery is not available (this is the default behavior). 45° imagery is only available for satellite and hybrid map types, within some locations, and at some zoom levels. Note: getTilt returns the current tilt angle, not the value specified by this option. Because getTilt and this option refer to different things, do not bind() the tilt property; doing so may yield unpredictable effects.

      • zoom

        @Option
public int zoom
        The initial Map zoom level. Required. Valid values: Integers between zero, and up to the supported maximum zoom level.

        Default: 8

      • zoomControl

        @Option
public Boolean zoomControl
        The enabled/disabled state of the Zoom control.

      • zoomControlOptions

        @Option
public final ZoomControlOptions zoomControlOptions
        The display options for the Zoom control.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapOptions

        public MapOptions()
